name: Gun Arena
description:
Gun arena

Gather your friends and be the least hit on this gun-filled arena! You can play up to 4 players on the browser using gamepads (just plug them in and the game should recognize them in the browser) or up to 2 players using only the Keyboard. 

Controls  for Controllers 

  • Move and jump   -  Left Joystick  or Direction pad
  • Shoot Left/Right -  A  /  B

Controls  for Keyboard      P1                                    |  P2

  • Move Left / Right   -> Left/Right Arrows   |  S / F
  • Jump                              -> Up arrow                      | E 
  • Shoot Left/Right     -> (Z/X)                                | (TAB / Q)

This game was made all by myself as part of a "One game a week challenge" I was doing with a friend. 

Thank you for playing! ヽ(*・ω・)ﾉ
